title: Cleanse
body: THIS IS A GLOBAL CLEANSE. It can be done from anywhere, in the comfort of your own home and lifestyle
During every change of season, the Earth goes through a rapid transformation and "cleaning". Our bodies are part of the Earth and go through the same changes.
Through the two weeks, we will support each other as we slowly reduce our food intake while increasing healing liquids that wash clean and rejuvenate. The basic protocol goes as follows:
1st Week - All liquids throughout the day with one meal for either lunch or dinner. Liquids can be juices, teas, smoothies and soups.
2nd Week - All liquids throughout the day. Liquids can be juices, teas, smoothies and soups. Slowly reduce the fiber intake by having more water, teas and juices.
There is no need to fear. We meet this cleanse where we are at. Relying on nutritious foods to support the body and reduce cravings. From beginner to advanced, this cleanse is made for All of us.
